claims.claim: Netflix serves over 57 million members with personalized recommendations
claims.quote: at Netflix we use personalization extensively and treat every situation as an opportunity to present the right content to each of our over 57 million members

claims.claim: The homepage's primary function is to help members easily find content they will enjoy
claims.quote: The primary function of the homepage is to help each member easily find something to watch that they will enjoy

claims.claim: Personalization addresses the challenge of having more content than can be displayed on a single page
claims.quote: A problem we face is that our catalog contains many more videos than can be displayed on a single page and each member comes with their own unique set of interests

claims.claim: The architecture supports rapid innovation and experimentation
claims.quote: This flexibility supports agile innovation. At Netflix we take advantage of this to support rapid experimentation

claims.claim: Netflix operates over 100 million different personalized products, one for each member
claims.quote: This is yet another way Netflix differs from traditional media offerings: we don't have one product but over a 100 million different products with one for each of our members with personalized recommendations and personalized visuals

claims.claim: Personalized artwork helps titles put their best foot forward for every member and improves member experience
claims.quote: Overall, by personalizing artwork we help each title put its best foot forward for every member and thus improve our member experience

claims.claim: Personalized artwork acts as a gateway to help members discover content by providing visual evidence of relevance
claims.quote: If the artwork representing a title captures something compelling to you, then it acts as a gateway into that title and gives you some visual 'evidence' for why the title might be good for you

claims.claim: Netflix's recommendation system goal is to get the right titles in front of members at the right time
claims.quote: For many years, the main goal of the Netflix personalized recommendation system has been to get the right titles in front each of our members at the right time
